description: Faucher de Saint-Maurice, Narcisse Henri Édouard: 1844-1897. Born and educated in Quebec; clerk of Legislative Council of Quebec, 1867-1881; editor-in-chief of Journal de Québec then Le Canadien; prolific writer; politician, 1881-1890 (Wallace, Dictionary of Canadian biography). // Marcott, Charles: 1844-1901.
